ygData.subject: A load of KitKats.

Subject: A load of KitKats.

OOC: Pay attention.  KitKat2 is for Drillbit's team and is with the 
Blackfortress group.  KitKat3 is working for Zardus. But since both 
KitKat's think they ar the original, and they look exactly like the 
original, and they both think and opperate the same, you'll need to 
check the number infront of the character.  OK, this concludes the 
public service announcement for this portion of the RPG. Thank you. 

Logo. 

::KitKat3::
She went outside and left the base.  She was headed fo the black 
fortess.  She knew that once she was there, she would find her old 
troops there. She couldn't wait to see them.  She hoped Drillbit was 
still alive and well, as well as the rest of her troops.  She high 
tailed it over the trails and ran as fast as she could.  She was in a 
big hurry, her spark just had to see Drillbit once again.

::KitKat2::
She looked at the other team mates that had returned.  She looked at 
Bludgeon and winked. "It's great to see you as well. You know, it's 
hard to find a great working team of bots these days. I'm glad you 
all made it."
She went just outside the base entrance for a bit of fresh air.  It 
felt great to have the old team back.  She did miss Terrosaur and the 
others. She missed Quickstrike and Rowdy Wolf. She wondered what 
would have happened had not that monster in the cave taken Rowdy. She 
shrugged her shoulders, "Ancient history." she said with a sigh. 
She lowered her head at the memory of having to kill LandMine and 
Timebomb.  She still felt guilty after all this time about having to 
kill a member of her pack to save that bot's suffering at the hands 
of the enemy.  She shook her head,"It's not easy living with the 
guilt is it? I wonder if other leaders feel remorse as well, or is it 
just me?"  She sat down and looked up at the sky. The clouds lazily 
passed on by.  She sniffed the air and thought she smelled a wolf. 
She shook her head and sniffed again.  She only picked up her own 
scent. She continued to think of the mistakes and triumphs along her 
tour of leader.  She knew one thing for sure, she would lead again. 

::KitKat3::
She neared the Black Fortress.  She smiled and knew she still had 5 
miles to go, but she felt like it was only a city block.  She wanted 
to see her old pack again.
